main event: A UFO was observed hovering over Fairborn, Ohio on July 8, 1962, with military personnel reporting the sighting.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 minutes and was documented by military personnel from a nearby Air Force base., The object appeared brighter than the brightest stars., It gave off smoke and changed shape during the sighting., The sky conditions were favorable for visual sightings., The witness compared the appearance of the object to a golf ball.
